availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Benjamin Faulconer and Emily Pollard Faulconer. Student in Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 142A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Harrison County, KY, June & July 1863, p. 146.
James G. Faulconer, Thomas Faulconer and His Descendants, (Baltimore, MD: Gateway Press, Inc, 1984), 94, 96.
"Sanford F. Faulkner (1843-1893)," Find A Grave, Memorial #14752834, accessed September 22, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/14752834.
